author: Simon Difford
description: Apricot brandy replaces triple sec in what otherwise follows the same recipe as a classic Margarita (2 tequila, 1 triple sec, 1 lime juice). As with classic Margaritas, depending on tastes you may want to add 2.5ml (half bar spoon) or more agave syrup.
name: Toreador

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
